He was never that effective anyway, but now even less so."},{"lineNumber":257110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やる気がないというか他人行儀的。（もういろいろと興味や生きる目的を失っている","translatedEnglishLine":"It's like he has no motivation and is distant. My chemistry with Rance is off even when talking; I feel dislike."},{"lineNumber":257115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女っけもないし、俺はなんて無駄な事をしたんだ。貴重な時間を無駄にしたー","translatedEnglishLine":"No women around either. What a waste of time I've made. Furthermore, Horaga shows that he has more knowledge than both of them."},{"lineNumber":257129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　そして、まだ世界に抵抗する二人にひややかな目を向ける","translatedEnglishLine":"He casts a cold glance at the two who still resist the world."},{"lineNumber":257130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　しかし、それだけの事を知ってまだ希望を捨てないというのはたいした物だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"But knowing all that and still not giving up hope is something remarkable."},{"lineNumber":257131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　私や歴代法王は男ばかりだったが、男と女の差だろうか、いや、そんな事はないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Both I and the previous popes were men, but is it the difference between men and women? it's only a matter of whether they bloom."},{"lineNumber":257147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アム・・君のやり方は面白い、だが、無意味だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Am... your method is interesting, but pointless."},{"lineNumber":257149,"originalJapaneseLine":"　理由はわざわざ説明はしない。","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't bother explaining why."},{"lineNumber":257150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　天文学的時間をかけて達成出来ない訳ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not that it can't be achieved given astronomical amounts of time."},{"lineNumber":257151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、それを成し遂げた後、あなたは別の絶望を知るであろう","translatedEnglishLine":"But after achieving it, you will know another kind of despair."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光あたりの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations around Chaos, Café, and Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガに関する情報、思い出話など・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Horaga, reminiscing stories, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the icy snowy region, on the way to Horaga's tower, camping and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーー、まだか、寒い・・寒い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh—are we there yet? It's cold... so cold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遭難してしまいそうだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might get lost out here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯を移動している話題・・少しは入れた方がいいかなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Topics about traveling through the snowy region... I thought it might be good to include a little of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、キャラは出さなくてもいいが、今回はちゃんと案内役を雇っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, characters don't have to appear, but this time we've officially hired a guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの案内のおっさんのお陰で比較的安全にこれているはずだよとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to that guide old man, we should be able to get here relatively safely, or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの塔に到着した。専用の背景はありません。何かうまくごまかして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Horaga's tower. There's no dedicated background. Need to cleverly work around that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 塔の入り口に付いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reached the entrance of the tower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後の流れは長すぎない程度に読んでて面白い物にして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make the following sequence interesting to read but not too long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの性格　キャラ設定を確認して書いて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please check Horaga's personality and character settings and write accordingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホモうんぬんは今回は性格の中心におきません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Homosexual themes will not be the focus of his personality this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世捨て人的なのを主にしたいので、そういう俗世的な物をまだ持っているのはおかしいので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I want to make him mainly a recluse, it would be strange if he still holds onto worldly things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガと日光、カフェ、カオスの会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations between Horaga and Nikkou, Café, Chaos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光、貴方の知識が必要な時ですと言うが、聞く耳をもたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou says, 'It's time we need your knowledge,' but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、覇気がない、昔からそんな有効的な奴ではなかったが、その時よりずっと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He somehow lacks ambition. He was never that effective anyway, but now even less so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる気がないというか他人行儀的。（もういろいろと興味や生きる目的を失っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like he has no motivation and is distant. (He's lost interest and purpose in life.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男にも興味無さそうだ、びっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't seem interested in men either, surprisingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧知の友だ、とくにもてなしも出来ないが、ゆっくり休んでいってくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old friend. I can't offer much hospitality, but please rest well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界か・・君達の活躍は聞いている、がんばってくれ。あまり興味ない感じ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world, huh... I've heard about your efforts. Keep it up. Doesn't seem very interested.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、あいつは・・ランスは会話しても相性よくなく、嫌いと感じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's with that guy...? My chemistry with Rance is off even when talking; I feel dislike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女っけもないし、俺はなんて無駄な事をしたんだ。貴重な時間を無駄にしたー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No women around either. What a waste of time I've made. I wasted precious time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかくだから、この世界の果てでセックスだ。と誰かを連れていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Might as well have sex at the edge of this world. He brings someone along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、ホラガの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Horaga's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーとアムが会いにいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku and Am went to meet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．クルックー、アムがホラガがどれだけ知っているかカマをかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1. Kurukku and Am try to probe how much Horaga knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．法王か君達は、では　ルドラサウムとこの世界の秘密を知っている訳だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 2. The Pope or you guys then know the secrets of Rudrasaum and this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、この世界は創造神ルドラサウムと神々が作り出した物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this world was created by the creator god Rudrasaum and the gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神々が自ら楽しむ為に、我ら人間を作り、魔王を作り、勇者を作った、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gods created humans, demon lords, and heroes for their own amusement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て神の娯楽の為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything is for the gods' entertainment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ここでコルルンサ、世界の秘密　オープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Korurunsa reveals the world's secret.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３．さらに、ホラガは二人より知識が多い事を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 3. Furthermore, Horaga shows that he has more knowledge than both of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、まだ世界に抵抗する二人にひややかな目を向ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He casts a cold glance at the two who still resist the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、それだけの事を知ってまだ希望を捨てないというのはたいした物だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But knowing all that and still not giving up hope is something remarkable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私や歴代法王は男ばかりだったが、男と女の差だろうか、いや、そんな事はないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both I and the previous popes were men, but is it the difference between men and women? No, probably not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達が特別なのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You two are probably special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．全てを知っているから、何もする気はしないが、君達はがんばるといい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4. Knowing everything, I have no will to act, but you two should do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果がどうなるか、それを見させてもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me watch what results you achieve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そうだ、久し振りに少しだけ会話らしい会話をさせてもらったお礼に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yes. As thanks for the first real conversation I've had in a while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達の聞きたい事をひとつだけ明日帰る前に答えてあげよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll answer one question you want to ask before I leave tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは重要です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This part is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くのユーザーはすでに知っている事ですが、世界のネタバレシーンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many users might already know, but this is a world spoiler scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第２部、第３部でも語る事はたぶん無いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably nothing like this will be discussed in Parts 2 and 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に３部は、これを知っている事を前提の流れになるかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially Part 3 will likely assume this knowledge as the premise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Plot points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間は最初に全て決められている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans are predetermined in everything from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らなかった方が幸せである、夢、希望・・努力なども意味が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's happier not to know; dreams, hopes... and effort have no meaning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人は産まれた時から才能限界値、能力が決められており、それが開花するかどうかだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A person's talent limit and abilities are decided at birth; it's only a matter of whether they bloom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アム・・君のやり方は面白い、だが、無意味だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Am... your method is interesting, but pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由はわざわざ説明はしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't bother explaining why.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天文学的時間をかけて達成出来ない訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not that it can't be achieved given astronomical amounts of time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それを成し遂げた後、あなたは別の絶望を知るであろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But after achieving it, you will know another kind of despair.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カフェ、日光あたりの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations around Chaos, Café, and Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガに関する情報、思い出話など・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Horaga, reminiscing stories, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the icy snowy region, on the way to Horaga's tower, camping and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーー、まだか、寒い・・寒い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh—are we there yet? It's cold... so cold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遭難してしまいそうだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might get lost out here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯を移動している話題・・少しは入れた方がいいかなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Topics about traveling through the snowy region... I thought it might be good to include a little of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、キャラは出さなくてもいいが、今回はちゃんと案内役を雇っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, characters don't have to appear, but this time we've officially hired a guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの案内のおっさんのお陰で比較的安全にこれているはずだよとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to that guide old man, we should be able to get here relatively safely, or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの塔に到着した。専用の背景はありません。何かうまくごまかして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Horaga's tower. There's no dedicated background. Need to cleverly work around that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 塔の入り口に付いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reached the entrance of the tower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後の流れは長すぎない程度に読んでて面白い物にして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make the following sequence interesting to read but not too long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの性格　キャラ設定を確認して書いて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please check Horaga's personality and character settings and write accordingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホモうんぬんは今回は性格の中心におきません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Homosexual themes will not be the focus of his personality this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世捨て人的なのを主にしたいので、そういう俗世的な物をまだ持っているのはおかしいので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I want to make him mainly a recluse, it would be strange if he still holds onto worldly things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガと日光、カフェ、カオスの会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations between Horaga and Nikkou, Café, Chaos...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光、貴方の知識が必要な時ですと言うが、聞く耳をもたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou says, 'It's time we need your knowledge,' but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、覇気がない、昔からそんな有効的な奴ではなかったが、その時よりずっと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He somehow lacks ambition. He was never that effective anyway, but now even less so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる気がないというか他人行儀的。（もういろいろと興味や生きる目的を失っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like he has no motivation and is distant. (He's lost interest and purpose in life.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男にも興味無さそうだ、びっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't seem interested in men either, surprisingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧知の友だ、とくにもてなしも出来ないが、ゆっくり休んでいってくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old friend. I can't offer much hospitality, but please rest well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界か・・君達の活躍は聞いている、がんばってくれ。あまり興味ない感じ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world, huh... I've heard about your efforts. Keep it up. Doesn't seem very interested.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、あいつは・・ランスは会話しても相性よくなく、嫌いと感じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's with that guy...? My chemistry with Rance is off even when talking; I feel dislike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女っけもないし、俺はなんて無駄な事をしたんだ。貴重な時間を無駄にしたー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No women around either. What a waste of time I've made. I wasted precious time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかくだから、この世界の果てでセックスだ。と誰かを連れていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Might as well have sex at the edge of this world. He brings someone along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、ホラガの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Horaga's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーとアムが会いにいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku and Am went to meet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．クルックー、アムがホラガがどれだけ知っているかカマをかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1. Kurukku and Am try to probe how much Horaga knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．法王か君達は、では　ルドラサウムとこの世界の秘密を知っている訳だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 2. The Pope or you guys then know the secrets of Rudrasaum and this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、この世界は創造神ルドラサウムと神々が作り出した物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this world was created by the creator god Rudrasaum and the gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神々が自ら楽しむ為に、我ら人間を作り、魔王を作り、勇者を作った、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gods created humans, demon lords, and heroes for their own amusement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て神の娯楽の為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything is for the gods' entertainment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ここでコルルンサ、世界の秘密　オープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Korurunsa reveals the world's secret.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３．さらに、ホラガは二人より知識が多い事を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 3. Furthermore, Horaga shows that he has more knowledge than both of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、まだ世界に抵抗する二人にひややかな目を向ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He casts a cold glance at the two who still resist the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、それだけの事を知ってまだ希望を捨てないというのはたいした物だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But knowing all that and still not giving up hope is something remarkable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私や歴代法王は男ばかりだったが、男と女の差だろうか、いや、そんな事はないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both I and the previous popes were men, but is it the difference between men and women? No, probably not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達が特別なのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You two are probably special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．全てを知っているから、何もする気はしないが、君達はがんばるといい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4. Knowing everything, I have no will to act, but you two should do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果がどうなるか、それを見させてもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me watch what results you achieve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そうだ、久し振りに少しだけ会話らしい会話をさせてもらったお礼に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yes. As thanks for the first real conversation I've had in a while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達の聞きたい事をひとつだけ明日帰る前に答えてあげよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll answer one question you want to ask before I leave tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは重要です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This part is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くのユーザーはすでに知っている事ですが、世界のネタバレシーンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many users might already know, but this is a world spoiler scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第２部、第３部でも語る事はたぶん無いです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably nothing like this will be discussed in Parts 2 and 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に３部は、これを知っている事を前提の流れになるかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially Part 3 will likely assume this knowledge as the premise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Plot points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間は最初に全て決められている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans are predetermined in everything from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らなかった方が幸せである、夢、希望・・努力なども意味が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's happier not to know; dreams, hopes... and effort have no meaning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人は産まれた時から才能限界値、能力が決められており、それが開花するかどうかだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A person's talent limit and abilities are decided at birth; it's only a matter of whether they bloom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アム・・君のやり方は面白い、だが、無意味だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Am... your method is interesting, but pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由はわざわざ説明はしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't bother explaining why.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天文学的時間をかけて達成出来ない訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not that it can't be achieved given astronomical amounts of time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それを成し遂げた後、あなたは別の絶望を知るであろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But after achieving it, you will know another kind of despair.
